group.label: Online checkout
group.comment: Configure the appearance, routing, and behavior of the plugin during the checkout step, including settings for headless integrations.

field.label: Payment method rendering in checkout
field.tooltip: Determines whether payment methods are displayed with their logo and name, or just the name.

field.label: Checkout return path
field.tooltip: The path the customer will be redirected to if a payment was not successful. Default is checkout/cart.

field.label: House number in checkout (address street field)
field.tooltip: Select which of the address lines will be the house number. Make sure to enable enough "Number of Lines in a Street Address" in Magento's Customer Configuration

group.label: Headless integration
group.comment:
With an headless integration, you build your own front end for your checkout flow and use the plugin's back end for processing the payment. These fields are only relevant if you have a headless integration.
Learn more about the headless integration

field.label: Payment Origin URL
field.tooltip: The default value is the Adobe Commerce store base URL. If you are using a separate front-end (headless) application, set this to the origin URL of the page where the 3D Secure Component is loaded.

field.label: Return URL for redirect payments
field.tooltip: The URL that the shopper is redirected to after the shopper completes a payment in a third-party gateway. The default return URL endpoint is {YOUR_MAGENTO_BASE_URL}/adyen/return.

field.label: Custom success redirect path
field.tooltip: Only relevant if the success path of your headless integration is not checkout/onepage/success. If set, the Order Increment ID will be added as a query parameter.
